title: Adventure in the Men's Locker Room
description: Rebecca Chase is a personal trainer with a naughty secret. When trying to act out a fantasy goes wrong, she finds herself tied up naked in the men's locker room of her gym. The clock is ticking towards opening time. Has Rebecca gone too far? This is the latest short story from Cheri Grade with the usual mix of fun, embarrassment and eroticism.
author: Cheri Grade
